sentences.en: He flashed pride from filmy eyes.
sentences.cn: 他朦胧的眼中闪出骄傲的光芒.

sentences.en: I held my hands out automatically, and the filmy white garter landed in my palms.
sentences.cn: 我不自觉地伸手去接,手心里便多出了一条薄薄的白色吊袜带.

sentences.en: I stare at filmy white curtain.
sentences.cn: 于是我便一直注视着朦胧的白窗帘.

sentences.en: Mind's underground moths grow filmy wings and a farewell flight in the sunset sky.
sentences.cn: 心底的飞蛾长着薄膜的翅膀在落日的天空作诀别的飞翔.

sentences.en: Mind's underground moths grow filmy wings and take a farewell flight in the sunset sky.
sentences.cn: 潜入心灵的羽蛾生着薄雾的双翅,在夕阳的天际做着永诀的飞舞.

sentences.en: She raises the Venetian blinds 14. I stare at the filmy white curtain, willing it to flutter 15.
sentences.cn: 她把百叶窗卷了起来, 我便盯着那薄薄的白窗帘, 盼着它飘起来.

sentences.en: Tall ( low ) press polyethylene ( filmy class ), some areas rise nearly 1000 yuan.
sentences.cn: 高 ( 低 ) 压聚乙烯 ( 薄膜级 ), 有些地区上升近1000元.

sentences.en: The corona is a brilliant, pearly white, filmy light, about as bright as the full Moon.
sentences.cn: 光环带是一种灿烂的珠白色朦胧光, 几乎像满月一样明亮.

words.tran_cn: 摄制电影；生薄膜；变得朦胧
在…上覆以薄膜；把…拍成电影

trans.tran_cn: 薄膜的，像软片的，朦胧的，薄的
trans.tran_en: A filmy fabric or substance is very thin and almost transparent
